DOC.brief_summary: The objective clinical trial evaluate safety effectiveness Bausch + Lomb Toric Accommodating Posterior Chamber Silicone Intraocular Lens use provide near , intermediate , distance vision reduction effect preoperative corneal astigmatism presbyopic patient undergoing cataract extraction intraocular lens ( IOL ) placement .
DOC.brief_title: Toric Intraocular Lens Following Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects must clinically document diagnosis agerelated cataract Subjects must require lens power 16 27 diopter Subjects must predict postoperative corneal astigmatism 0.83D 2.50D , determine Toric Calculator Subjects anterior segment pathology extracapsular/ phacoemulsification cataract surgery would contraindicate . Subjects diagnose degenerative visual disorder . Subjects condition associate increase risk zonular rupture . Subjects previous corneal surgery plan operative eye . Subjects irregular corneal astigmatism . Subjects clinically significant retinal pigment epithelium/macular change . Subjects chronic use systemic steroid immunosuppressive medication . Subjects either concurrently participate another clinical trial participate another clinical trial within 60 day prior enrollment study . Subjects difference corneal astigmatism measure IOL Master topographer great 0.5 D use vector analysis .
